crt.blockConfig.blockUsageLimit.description: Label shown next to the input field for configuring how often a block can be used by students.
crt.blockConfig.blockUsageLimit.message: How many times can this block be used?

crt.blockConfig.canBlockBeUsed.description: Label shown next to the checkbox for configuring whether a given block can be used by students.
crt.blockConfig.canBlockBeUsed.message: Can this block be used by students?

crt.blockConfig.hasBlockUsageLimit.description: Label shown next to the checkbox for configuring whether a there is a limit to how often a block can be used by students.
crt.blockConfig.hasBlockUsageLimit.message: Is there a limit to how many times this block can be used?

crt.blockConfig.heading.description: Heading of the block config modal shown when configuring whether a given block can be used by students.

crt.extensions.assertions.assertDefaultV.message: x-Coordinate of final position is correct

crt.extensions.assertions.categoryName.description: Label for the Assertions extension category

crt.extensions.assertions.event_whenTask.description: The name displayed on the scratch block that runs after the project has stopped running

crt.taskConfig.allowAllStandardBlocks.description: Label shown on the button that, when clicked, allows all standard blocks to be used by students.
crt.taskConfig.allowAllStandardBlocks.message: Allow all standard blocks to be used

crt.taskConfig.allowCustomProcedureBlock.description: Label for checkbox to allow custom procedures in task

crt.taskConfig.allowVariableBlocks.description: Label for checkbox to allow variables in task

crt.taskConfig.disallowAllBlocks.description: Label shown on the button that, when clicked, disallows all blocks from being used by students.

crt.taskConfig.enableAssertions.description: Label shown next to the checkbox that allows a teacher to simulate the assertion mode when editing.
crt.taskConfig.enableAssertions.message: Enable assertions simulating a student solving the task.

crt.taskConfig.enableStageInteractions.description: Label for checkbox to enable stage interactions in task
crt.taskConfig.enableStageInteractions.message: Enable students to interact with the stage

crt.taskConfig.heading.description: Heading of the task config modal.

crt.taskConfig.maximumExecutionTime.description: Label shown next to the input field for setting the maximum execution time.
